00053             function                __construct()
00054             {
00055                   try
00056                   {
00057                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00058                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package_object( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00059                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00060                   }
00061                   catch( Exception $e )
00062                   {
00063                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00064                   }

00093             function                process_basename( $Str , $Changed )
00094             {
00095                   try
00096                   {
00097                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'basename' ) ; )
00098                         {
00099                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00100                               
00101                               $Str = str_replace( 
00102                                     "{basename:$Params}" , 
00103                                     basename( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' ) ) , 
00104                                     $Str
00105                               );
00106                               
00107                               $Changed = true;
00108                         }
00109                         
00110                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00111                   }
00112                   catch( Exception $e )
00113                   {
00114                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00115                   }
00116             }
00117             
00144             function                process_image_path( $Str , $Changed )
00145             {
00146                   try
00147                   {
00148                         $Limitations = array( 'file_name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00149                         
00150                         for( ; ( $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'image_path' , $Limitations ) ) !== false ; )
00151                         {
00152                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00153                               
00154                               $FileName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_name' );
00155                               
00156                               if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' , false ) === false )
00157                               {
00158                                     $TemplatePath = $this->PageComposer->get_template_path();
00159                                     $RealFilePath = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_file_path( 
00160                                           $TemplatePath."/res/images/$FileName" , false
00161                                     );
00162                                     if( $RealFilePath === false )
00163                                     {
00164                                           $PageComposerFilePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' );
00165                                           $RealFilePath = $PageComposerFilePath."/res/images/$FileName";
00166                                           if( file_exists( $RealFilePath ) === false )
00167                                           {
00168                                                 throw( new Exception( "File '$FileName' was not found" ) );
00169                                           }
00170                                     }
00171                               }
00172                               else
00173                               {
00174                                     $PackageFilePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 
00175                                           $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , 
00176                                           $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' )
00177                                     );
00178                                     $RealFilePath = $PackageFilePath."/res/images/$FileName";
00179                                     if( file_exists( $RealFilePath ) === false )
00180                                     {
00181                                           throw( new Exception( "File '$FileName' was not found" ) );
00182                                     }
00183                               }
00184                               
00185                               $Str = str_replace( "{image_path:$Params}" , $RealFilePath , $Str );
00186 
00187                               $Changed = true;
00188                         }
00189                         
00190                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00191                   }
00192                   catch( Exception $e )
00193                   {
00194                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00195                   }
00196             }

00224             function                process_package_path( $Str , $Changed )
00225             {
00226                   try
00227                   {
00228                         for( ; ( $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'package_path' ) ) !== false ; )
00229                         {
00230                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00231                               
00232                               $RealPackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 
00233                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , 
00234                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' )
00235                               );
00236                               
00237                               $Str = str_replace( 
00238                                     "{package_path:$Params}" , $RealPackagePath , $Str
00239                               );
00240 
00241                               $Changed = true;
00242                         }
00243                         
00244                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00245                   }
00246                   catch( Exception $e )

00249                   }

00282             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00283             {
00284                   try
00285                   {
00286                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_basename( $Str , $Changed );
00287                         
00288                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_image_path( $Str , $Changed );
00289                         
00290                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_package_path( $Str , $Changed );
00291                         
00292                         return( $Str );
00293                   }
00294                   catch( Exception $e )
00295                   {
00296                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00297                   }
00298             }
